languages.text: "Нам придется отыскать другой путь. Понимаю, тем, кто всю жизнь прожил за стенами мира-корабля, не просто принять, что жизнь ведет нас разными тропами. Но та тропа, что вы с провидцами избрали сейчас, ведет лишь к новой боли".

traits.locale_text: "Нам лишь придется отыскать другой путь. Понимаю, тем, кто всю жизнь прожил за стенами мира-корабля, не просто принять, что жизнь ведет нас разными тропами. Но та тропа, что вы с провидцами избрали сейчас, ведеть лишь к новой боли".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "We will have to find another way. I understand that it is not easy for those who have lived all their lives sheltered within a craftworld to accept that sometimes life leads us down different paths. But the path that you and the Farseers have chosen only leads to more pain."
languages.original_text: "Нам придется отыскать другой путь. Понимаю, тем, кто всю жизнь прожил за стенами мира-корабля, не просто принять, что жизнь ведет нас разными тропами. Но та тропа, что вы с провидцами избрали сейчас, ведет лишь к новой боли".

traits.locale_text: "We will have to find another way. I understand that it is not easy for those who have lived all their lives sheltered within a craftworld to accept that sometimes life leads us down different paths. But the path that you and the seers have chosen only leads to more pain."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We will have to find another way. I understand that it is not easy for those who have lived all their lives sheltered within a craftworld to accept that sometimes life leads us down different paths. But the path that you and the seers have chosen only leads to more pain."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We will have to find another way. I understand that it is not easy for those who have lived all their lives sheltered within a craftworld to accept that sometimes life leads us down different paths. But the path that you and the seers have chosen only leads to more pain."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We will have to find another way. I understand that it is not easy for those who have lived all their lives sheltered within a craftworld to accept that sometimes life leads us down different paths. But the path that you and the seers have chosen only leads to more pain."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We will have to find another way. I understand that it is not easy for those who have lived all their lives sheltered within a craftworld to accept that sometimes life leads us down different paths. But the path that you and the Farseers have chosen only leads to more pain."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We will have to find another way. I understand that it is not easy for those who have lived all their lives sheltered within a craftworld to accept that sometimes life leads us down different paths. But the path that you and the Farseers have chosen only leads to more pain."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Tendremos que hallar otro modo. Me hago cargo de que, para quienes han vivido en la seguridad de un mundo astronave, resulta difícil aceptar que en ocasiones la vida nos lleva por caminos distintos. Pero la senda que los videntes y tú habéis elegido solo conducirá a más dolor».
languages.original_text: "We will have to find another way. I understand that it is not easy for those who have lived all their lives sheltered within a craftworld to accept that sometimes life leads us down different paths. But the path that you and the Farseers have chosen only leads to more pain."

traits.locale_text: «Tendremos que hallar otro modo. Me hago cargo de que, para quienes han vivido en la seguridad de un mundo astronave, resulta difícil aceptar que en ocasiones la vida nos lleva por caminos distintos. Pero la senda que los videntes y tú habéis elegido solo conducirá a más dolor».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我们必须找到其他方法。我明白，对那些一辈子都活在方舟世界里的人而言，踏上命运安排的其他道路并不是件容易的事情。不过，你和那些先知选择的道路，只会带来更多痛苦。”
languages.original_text: "We will have to find another way. I understand that it is not easy for those who have lived all their lives sheltered within a craftworld to accept that sometimes life leads us down different paths. But the path that you and the Farseers have chosen only leads to more pain."

traits.locale_text: “我们必须找到其他方法。我明白，对那些一辈子都活在方舟世界里的人而言，踏上命运安排的其他道路并不是件容易的事情。不过，你和那些先知选择的道路，只会带来更多痛苦。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Nous allons devoir trouver une autre solution. Je comprends qu'il soit difficile d'accepter que la vie nous fait parfois prendre différentes voies, surtout pour ceux qui ont toujours vécu à l'abri d'un vaisseau-monde, mais la voie que les Grands Prophètes et vous avez choisie ne mène qu'à davantage de douleur. »
languages.original_text: "We will have to find another way. I understand that it is not easy for those who have lived all their lives sheltered within a craftworld to accept that sometimes life leads us down different paths. But the path that you and the Farseers have chosen only leads to more pain."

traits.locale_text: « Nous allons devoir trouver une autre solution. Je comprends qu'il soit difficile d'accepter que la vie nous fait parfois prendre différentes voies, surtout pour ceux qui ont toujours vécu à l'abri d'un vaisseau-monde, mais la voie que les prophètes et vous avez choisie ne mène qu'à davantage de douleur. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「我々は別の道を探さなければならない。方舟に守られて生きてきた人間にとって、人生には別の道を歩むこともあるということを受け入れるのは容易くないことわかっている。だが、あなた方先見司たちが選んだ道は、さらなる苦しみをもたらすだけだ」
languages.original_text: "We will have to find another way. I understand that it is not easy for those who have lived all their lives sheltered within a craftworld to accept that sometimes life leads us down different paths. But the path that you and the Farseers have chosen only leads to more pain."

traits.locale_text: 「我々は別の道を探さなければならない。方舟に守られて生きてきた人間にとって、人生には別の道を歩むこともあるということを受け入れるのは容易くないことわかっている。だが、あなた方先見司たちが選んだ道は、さらなる苦しみをもたらすだけだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Wir werden einen anderen Weg finden müssen. Mir ist klar, wenn man sein ganzes Leben sicher auf einem Weltenschiff verbracht hat, dann ist es schwer zu akzeptieren, dass das Leben uns manchmal auf einen anderen Pfad führt. Doch der Pfad, den Ihr und die Runenpropheten gewählt habt, führt nur zu noch mehr Schmerz."
languages.original_text: "We will have to find another way. I understand that it is not easy for those who have lived all their lives sheltered within a craftworld to accept that sometimes life leads us down different paths. But the path that you and the Farseers have chosen only leads to more pain."

traits.locale_text: "Wir werden einen anderen Weg finden müssen. Mir ist klar, wenn man sein ganzes Leben sicher auf einem Weltenschiff verbracht hat, dann ist es schwer zu akzeptieren, dass das Leben uns manchmal auf einen anderen Pfad führt. Doch der Pfad, den Ihr und die Seher gewählt haben, führt nur zu noch mehr Schmerz."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Başka bir yol bulacağız. Tüm hayatlarını bir gemidünyaya sığınarak geçirenler için hayatın bazen bizi farklı yollara sürüklediğini kabul etmenin kolay olmadığının farkındayım. Ancak Ötesezenlerle birlikte seçtiğin yol, yalnızca daha da fazla acıya çıkıyor."
languages.original_text: "We will have to find another way. I understand that it is not easy for those who have lived all their lives sheltered within a craftworld to accept that sometimes life leads us down different paths. But the path that you and the Farseers have chosen only leads to more pain."

traits.locale_text: "Başka bir yol bulacağız. Tüm hayatlarını bir gemidünyaya sığınarak geçirenler için hayatın bazen bizi farklı yollara sürüklediğini kabul etmenin kolay olmadığının farkındayım. Ancak Ötesezenlerle birlikte seçtiğin yol, yalnızca daha da fazla acıya çıkıyor."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
